column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Debra - Thank you for the great review! We are pleased that you found us
column2: and most pleased that you like what we have on offer. We strive to match the standards set by our parent headquarters in Los Angeles
column3: so feedback like yours confirms we are moving in the right direction. Thank you again for the kind words
column4: and we look forward to serving you again soon!
